title: Selena Gomez says 'something beautiful came out of a lot of pain'
text:
She's doing the rounds in New York, promoting her new singles Lose You To Love Me and Look At Her Now.

And Selena Gomez sizzled in purple on Tuesday, as she opened up about how her breakup with ex boyfriend Justin Bieber inspired her.

'I wrote Lose You To Love Me in the beginning of the year,' she revealed in a new interview broadcast on SiriusXM. 'We were in L.A. and I was just going to go in the studio for a session, I wasn't quite sure what was going to come of it, and within two hours, even an hour, we basically wrapped up the song.'

Selena Gomez says 'something beautiful came out of a lot of pain' as she promotes Bieber-inspired breakup track in sizzling purple jacket

Selena sizzled in purple on Tuesday, as she visited a series of radio stations in New York

Sign it: Here she is seen visiting Music Choice

She continued: 'I mean a lot of pain went behind the song but it ended up being something that is beautiful. I think my new work is very different than some of the last singles and records I've put out, not in any way, different, it's just, I've continuously grown up and so there's different directions and I'm still figuring out sometimes kind of where I want to go, it's always, never one way, but it's exciting to try new things.

'For me, my intentions are never evil. They just aren't. I don't even know how to do that. My intentions can be a bit snappy but I always want to come from a place that's genuine, and when I feel like some things haven't been said, then, I get to turn things into art.'

On Tuesday Selena, 27, looked happy as she smiled and took numerous pictures with lucky fans who waited outside of the Music Choice studio for her arrival.

Rise and shine! Selena Gomez dressed in style as she was spotted emerging from a local radio station while in New York City for her press tour

Beautiful: The singer looked happy as she smiled and took numerous pictures with lucky fans who waited outside of the studio for her arrival

For the bold look, she wore a gray collared button up that she had showing through her bright purple jacket.

The jacket had four large white buttons and she had it tied around her waist.

It had a large lapel and a deep v-neck that showed her button up underneath.

To finish of the look, she wore a pair of deep purple slacks that flared out at the bottom.

Looking fab! To finish of the look, she wore a pair of deep purple slacks that flared out at the bottom

Her ex: Her heartbreaking first single is rumored to be about her past love about her on-again-off-again boyfriend Justin Bieber
description: She's got a lot on her plate since releasing her two latest singles, Lose You To Love Me and Look At Her Now. And Selena Gomez is doing it all in style as she was spotted emerging from a radio station.
